entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sachigo Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:35 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -33.8°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -33.8°C
Pressure: 103.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
